about_the_game:
"***The DLC does not include the main game***

The Sunset Speedway DLC offers you new horizons for speed and luxury. The Sunset Speedway racetrack awaits with picturesque views and difficult turns, along with three unique new supercars.

The DLC includes:

  • The Sunset Speedway racetrack
  • P92 (unique): Aggressive and powerful, it's for anyone who values speed and precision.*
  • MLN (unique): The epitome of luxury that offers unrivaled comfort at high speed.*
  • LMH (unique): A car that sets new standards for sports cars.*
  • B19 Special Edition: A special car to let you dive into exploring the new location.

The Sunset Speedway DLC isn't just about the new cars and track; it's your chance to enter the elite world of car racing and show your mastery."

short_description: The Sunset Speedway DLC contains a new racetrack and three new supercars. A riveting track with gorgeous vistas awaits, along with three unique supercars to let you experience the combination of speed and luxury.
